attributes.action: To remove Harriet Harman from office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Harriet Harman no longer has the trust or the backing of the public.

The new Equalities Bill, as proposed by Harriet Harman, includes an intention to legalize discrimination against British males in favour of female and ethnic minority candidates.

Legalized discrimination in the workplace is specialized apartheid. It will never be a positive force for change and must not be allowed to become law.

We request that the ministers is removed from office for her blantant and continual misrepresentation of the public she is supposed to be serving.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
